summary: When a Newsweek photojournalist disappears in war-torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him.
cast: Andie MacDowell|Elias Koteas|Brendan Gleeson|Adrien Brody|David Strathairn|Alun Armstrong|Caroline Goodall|Diane Baker|Quinn Shephard|Marie Trintignant|Christian Charmetant|Gerard Butler|Scott Anton|Christopher Clarke|Dragan Antonic|Marie-Béatrice Bernert|Antony Boehm|Predrag Bjelac|Kurt Cramer|Nicole Estabrooks|Simon Francis|Milan Gargula|Rich Gold|Bela Grushka|Jessica Horáthová|Amy Huck|Corey Johnson|Joel Kirby|Rianne Kooiman|Ljiljana Krstic|Gregory Linington|Deborah Michaels|Slobodan Milovanovic|Sasa Nikolic|Zivko Petrov|Dragan Radivojevic Lav|Michael Rogers|Bruce Solomon|Joel Sugerman|Dale Wyatt|Goran Radakovic|Scott Terry|Andrew Blanchard|Michael Cella
title: Las flores de Harrison
